title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 2 - Requirements For The Production, Processing, Manufacturing And Distribution Of Milk And Milk Products
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 2 - Requirements For The Production, Processing, Manufacturing And Distribution Of Milk And Milk Products

State Regulations
§ 2.1 - Applicability
§ 2.2 - Definitions
§ 2.3 - General permits; permit to sell raw milk; permit to ship into the state; permit to produce milk
§ 2.4 - Labeling; identification of vehicles
§ 2.5 - Inspections
§ 2.6 - Certified milk inspectors and processing plant superintendents
§ 2.7 - Sampling and analysis of prepasteurized milk; requirements when prepasteurized milk fails to meet standards set forth in section 2.8 of this part
§ 2.8 - Quality standards

Sanitation Requirements for Dairy Farms (§ 2.9 to 2.28)

Sanitation Requirements Applicable to the Processing and Manufacturing of Milk, Lowfat Milk, Skim Milk, Milk Products, Goat Milk, Goat Milk Products, Sheep Milk Products, Melloream and Frozen Desserts (§ 2.29 to 2.65)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 2

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§16, 18, 46, 46-a, 50-k, 71-a, 71-n, 214-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
